participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and introspective, enjoys exploring new experiences and values humor.
participant_1.background: I like to try new restaurants and my favorite place to eat recently is this new sushi place that just opened up. I don't know if I enjoy programming, or if it's my only choice. I relax by watching horror movies with my favorite snacks and enjoy my tattoos. I'm not a picky eater, but I do have my preferences. I want someone who can make me laugh and share my love of pizza.

participant_2.name: Maya
participant_2.personality: Creative and nurturing, passionate about nature and enjoys quiet moments with family.
participant_2.background: I'm looking forward to spending time with my son playing some games together. I am a wildlife photographer, and I wear cardigans to keep warm when I'm out in the field. I love huge paintings. I prefer to read books to get my entertainment, so social media isn't very important to me. I am saving up to buy a new camera.

content.text: Hey there! Not much, just relaxing at home.
Nice, I'm watching a horror movie. Do you like horror?
Sometimes, but I usually read before bed so I don't like to be too scared.
Haha yeah, I can see that being a problem. What kind of books do you like to read?
I love huge paintings, so I like to read historical fiction and fantasy books.
That's cool, I'm more into science fiction and thrillers.
I like those too! I'm saving up to buy a new camera so I can take better pictures of wildlife.
That's awesome, I love photography too. I'm trying to decide if I want to be a programmer or a wildlife photographer.
Oh that's a tough choice, both seem like really cool jobs.
Yeah, I'm not sure what to do.
Well, you could always do both!
Haha yeah, that's true. I'll have to think about it.
